channel.title: Other Desktop Environments
channel.description: My whonix is very very slow. How can i remove kde and all these fancy things? I want openbox as my only windows manager. I see there is option to build from source, but right now it's too complicated for me to do that. Thank you for great work to help people achieve freedom!

item.title: Other Desktop Environments
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
For general information about current state of things (linked from main page link DOCUMENTATION https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation):
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Desktop_Environments

For build documentation (linked from main page link DEVELOP link, which links to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Developer_Portal):
https://whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Developer_Portal

Read full topic
